scripts.push-routes:prod: NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c production -- pnpm esno scripts/push-routes.ts
scripts.push-routes:preview: NODE_ENV=preview doppler run -c preview -- pnpm esno scripts/push-routes.ts
scripts.push-routes:locally: NODE_ENV=development LOCALLY=true doppler run -- pnpm esno scripts/push-routes.ts
scripts.test:locally: pnpm push-routes:locally && concurrently -k 'pnpm start-local-server' 'rm -rf diskv && pnpm -r --filter router build && LOCALLY=true doppler run -- vitest --run'
